title: Soulmate
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School, Fair Dinkum and Lincoln Douglas Hiatt
brief_description: Motifs of water and innocence lost abound in this short film about a troubled adult, Jordan, who is plagued by an image from childhood of a woman in red. Cast includes David Gray, Kim Trengrove and Timothy Fox. Music by David Bridie.
